Core Flight Executive Documentation

cFE Deployment Guide

The purpose of this document is to provide guidelines and conventions for the deployment of the cFE to a desired platform or platforms. In addition, instructions are included for creating a ground database and pages in order to provide a user interface. Note that the ground database is specific to the ASIST ground system.

  • How to Configure, Build, and Run the cFE

      • Create System Environment Variables

      • Configure the makefile in each CPU Directory
      • Configure the mission and CPU specific cFE Application Parameter files
    • Build the cFE Core and cFE Applications
    • Load and Run the cFE Core and cFE Applications

      • Setup the Target File Systems
      • Transfer the cFE Applications and Startup File to the Target Non-Volatile Disk
      • Description of Fields in the Startup script
      • Start the cFE Core on the Target

    • BAE RAD750 / vxWorks 6.4 Platform
